name: Dribble.
description:
Only 5% people can score over 100. Are you one of them?

Dribble your way to the top!
Engage in a soothing and hypnotising experience that will keep you coming back for more.

Keep the ball in the center for as long as possible.

◉ Minimalistic and beautiful graphics
◉ Soothing music and sound effects
◉ Challenge your friends and others worldwide and be the best!
◉ Includes daily, regional and facebook rankings

Introducing mod rotations
◉ Refreshing challenges everyday
◉ Discover your favourite playstyle
◉ Reveal your true potential in the mod rankings
◉ More mods on the way!
◉ Added record tab in recent leaderboard, find out the top players in the previous days
